description.english: Got at least one prize ticket!
Completed one stage to 100%... can you complete more?
Stole colour from salmon you scurrilous fiend!
Helped somebody realized their true self!
Blew up a priceless wooden helicopter!
Hey, I think you're friends now!
You made a dingle-dang balloon! Now what?
You got a big van to back the heck off!
You touched a horse in your dreams!
You blew up a helicopter! Wait, what?
Put out just a BUNCH of fires, yo.
Defeated the deadly primeval plant thing!
Got hit by a piece of popcorn!
Crashed the nasty wooden space ship!
Got all the hats and clothing and skills and stuff!
Got all the crowns and cakes!
51% completion of the whole game already?
100% completion, yo! Way to go, you rock!
Beat the model completion time for the whole game!
100% completion, and under the model time!
Got hit by the timestop ability!
Listened to all the Blump Facts!
Got at least 110 tickets in Supa Rock Drop
Used exactly 69 Rainbowpower on a single door!
Beat Colnel Blump at least once!
Got to the promo shot from the game!
Learned the Secret Truth of the Universe!
Got meowed at by the Empurress!
Spena bunch of tickets on STUFF
Visited the Art Gallery, learned stuff.
Defeated the Worst Boss in the Game
Restored all the paintings, even the secret one

name: Did a non-descript thing that I'm not going to describe in detail and which involves something I'm not going to tell you about that is secret and also pretty much pointless as well as having no effect on the story whatsoever, but which you must complete to get 100% of the achievements and I'm sorry
